comment.author: Alex
comment.text: Liar That's all she is Hey Trump! Have you watched hillaarys America? I think you need to load your weapons and start during some very damning truths about this old wench AND her rapists husband.

replies.author: Hailey
replies.text: Tell me what you said in an email number 30,321 in 2009 . Then prove it and I'll accept your stupid comment

replies.text: You tell me who it was to and what it pertained to and I WILL!

replies.text: I take it you have yet to see the movie. Don't EVEN start on ME.
